Subject: English
Description: knowledge and understanding of the text, its structure, and the ideas, concerns and values it explores

Subject: English
Description: development of a coherent analysis in response to the topic

Subject: English
Description: use of evidence from the text to support the analysis

Subject: English
Description: use of fluent expression through appropriate use of vocabulary and conventions of Standard Australian English

Subject: English
Description: the capacity to create a reading of the text's ideas/values

Subject: English
Description: the capacity to sequence and substantiate ideas relevant to the topic

Subject: English
Description: the capacity to communicate these ideas

Subject: English
Description: use of relevant idea(s) drawn from one Framework of Ideas, the title provided and at least one piece of stimulus material

Subject: English
Description: creation of a cohesive text that connects to a clear purpose(s) and incorporates an appropriate voice

Subject: English
Description: use of suitable text structure(s) and language features to create a text

Subject: English
Description: use of fluent expression, including the appropriate use of vocabulary

Subject: English
Description: understanding of contention, argument(s), and point of view

Subject: English
Description: analysis of the ways in which written and spoken language and visuals are used to present an argument(s) and to persuade an intended audience

Subject: English
Description: use of evidence from the text to support the analysis

Subject: English
Description: use of fluent expression through appropriate use of vocabulary and conventions of Standard Australian English
